name: The Modern's Long Rum Punch
description: This adaptation of a classic rum punch uses Earl Grey tea to add complexity to the rich and tropical drink, lightened with bitter lemon soda.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup loose leaf Earl Grey tea
Splash Fever Tree Bitter Lemon soda
Garnish: lemon, lime, and orange wheel (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: For the syrup: heat water and sugar until water comes to a boil, stirring to dissolve. Remove from heat and add tea leaves. Steep 10 minutes. Strain and let cool before using.

For the cocktail: fill a cocktail shaker with ice, add rum, apricot liqueur, Earl Grey syrup, lemon juice, and orange bitters. Shake well. Fill a highball glass with fresh ice and strain cocktail into serving glass. Top with Bitter Lemon soda. Garnish if desired and serve immediately.
